channel.title: Ridley Park United Methodist Church (RPUMC) Podcasted Sermons
channel.itunes:subtitle: RPUMC Sermons
channel.itunes:author: Ridley Park United Methodist Church
channel.itunes:summary: Ridley Park United Methodist sermons are recorded weekly during our Sunday Services. They run for 15 to 20 minutes. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store
channel.description: Ridley Park United Methodist sermons are recorded weekly during our Sunday Services. They run for 15 to 20 minutes. After listening, be sure to visit our site at http://www.ridleyparkumc.org!

image.title: Ridley Park United Methodist Church (RPUMC) Podcasted Sermons
